remarks: Value of a mapped algebra scalar.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Mar-2015.)
statement:
asclfval.a $e |- A = ( algSc ` W ) $.
asclfval.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
asclfval.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
asclfval.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
asclfval.o $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` W ) $.
asclval $p |- ( X e. K -> ( A ` X ) = ( X .x. .1. ) ) $.
